$merge 
( [$,

{
              "CASEID":(
              $CASEID:=  function ($a, $b, $c,$d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j)
                      { $a &'-'& $b &'-'& $c &'-'& $d &'-'& $e &'-'& $f &'-'& $g &'-'& $h &'-'& $i &'-'& $j } ;
              $CASEID($.State,$.Pathogen,$.PersonID,$.DOB,$.Sex,$.SubSpec,$.CULTPRIORITY,$.Priority,$.DtSpec,$.STRCODE);
                       ),
                       "test": "testtestFoo!",
            "AgeGroup":($.AgeYr < 5 ? "1-4" : 
                       ($.AgeYr < 10 ? "5-9" : 
                       ($.AgeYr < 20 ? "10-19" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 30 ? "20-29" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 40 ? "30-39" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 50 ? "40-49" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 60 ? "50-59" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 70 ? "60-69" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 80 ? "70-79" :
                       ($.AgeYr >= 80 ? "80+" :
                        "Unknown"
                        )))))))))),
                        
            "AgeGroupSort":
                 (
                 $sort:= 
                   ($.AgeYr < 5 ? "1-4" : 
                       ($.AgeYr < 10 ? "5-9" : 
                       ($.AgeYr < 20 ? "10-19" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 30 ? "20-29" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 40 ? "30-39" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 50 ? "40-49" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 60 ? "50-59" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 70 ? "60-69" :
                       ($.AgeYr < 80 ? "70-79" :
                       ($.AgeYr >= 80 ? "80+" :
                        "Unknown"
                        )))))))))
                   );     
            $sort = "1-4" ? 1 : $sort= "5-9" ? 2 : $sort= "10-19" ?  3 : $sort= "20-29" ? 4 : $sort = "30-39" ? 5 :
            $sort = "40-49" ? 6 : $sort = "50-59" ? 7 : $sort = "60-69" ? 8 : $sort = "70-79" ? 9 : $sort = "80+" ? 10 :
            100
                  ),
                  
          "meta data": 
                            {
                      "pipeline": "eip-legacy-monthly",
                      "program": "fdd-legacy",
                      "Xform-Profile-Name": "otm2-fddProfile",
                      "Xform-Profile-Version": "0.01",
                      "Security Group": $.State & '-'& "To be determined",
                      "fileDateTime": "2018-11-30T16:13:33.593Z",
                      "fileType":"What goes here?"
                            }
            
  }] )
